1.title: A Perfect Storm
1.plot: After surviving Hurricane Katrina, Joshua Kagler must bring the harmony back to his award winning but tumultuous choir. Another storm begins to brew when Deitrick and Michelle ask an ex-choir member to rejoin.

2.title: Inner City Blues
2.plot: After 25 years of recruiting youths from the streets for his Inner City Choir, Jeffrey is worn out and ready to throw in the towel. Deitrick and Michelle have 5 days to prove that this choir has what it takes before their leader calls it quits.

3.title: A Choir with Two Heads
3.plot: Deitrick and Michelle travel to the Big Apple to try to modernize an all-girls Barbershop Choir. They quickly realize that they must help the choir director repair her relationship with her mother, in order to repair the choir.

4.title: Redemption
4.plot: Victor Bell's choir was on the road to greatness before a disastrous event caused the choir to fall apart. Now, five years later with new members, can Deitrick and Michelle bring everyone together and find redemption?

5.title: Mama's Family
5.plot: When choir founder Mama Pat passed on, her choir lost its place in the Santa Barbara community. The younger members try to get their name back out to the community. Deitrick and Michelle step in to help rebuild the legacy that Mama Pat left behind.

6.title: Soul-ed Out
6.plot: Deitrick and Michelle hit the beach to help the newly formed Hermosa Beach Gospel Choir find their soul and recruit new members before they experience financial collapse.

7.title: Go with the Flow
7.plot: The renowned Flow choir is tired of their choir director's constant bullying and are ready to quit. Will Deitrick and Michelle be able to help them settle their differences before they decide to sing their last notes together?

8.title: Man in the Mirror
8.plot: Tyanta's temper flares when things get out of hand with a diva choir member, and Michelle is forced to step in. Deitrick puts his name on the line to try to land Tyanta Snow and his choir Xtreme Purpose a deal.

imdb.plot outline: In this bold and uplifting music-driven series, struggling choirs will get a chance of much needed mentoring with the help of gospel superstar Deitrick Haddon ("Preachers of L.A.") and Grammy-Award winning recording artist Michelle Williams of "Destiny's Child" fame. Each week, the duo will surprise a community, school or gospel choir and help them find perfect harmony both within their music - and their members. They will dive deep into the members' lives to tackle the choir's core issues including leadership, inter-personal conflicts, artistic direction and presentation, doing whatever it takes to get these choirs back on track with perfect pitch and newfound confidence.
imdb.title: Fix My Choir
plot: In this bold and uplifting music-driven series, struggling choirs will get a chance of much needed mentoring with the help of gospel superstar Deitrick Haddon ("Preachers of L.A.") and Grammy-Award winning recording artist Michelle Williams of "Destiny's Child" fame. Each week, the duo will surprise a community, school or gospel choir and help them find perfect harmony both within their music - and their members. They will dive deep into the members' lives to tackle the choir's core issues including leadership, inter-personal conflicts, artistic direction and presentation, doing whatever it takes to get these choirs back on track with perfect pitch and newfound confidence.
